TopicTitle: Assorted issues with ALL Nertea mods

Articles.Content:
I have tried installing a couple of Nertea's mods on my mac and i get several issues with all of them:

1. the screen crops (this happens with all of them)

2. the parts dont all show up (this has happened with other mods too not just Nertea's)

in the case of waterfall, it works but the screen crops.

with near future, no parts show up but screen still crops

with far future, not all parts show up.

I have tried reinstalling 3 times to no avail. This is my mod list;

Habtech2, scatterer, RPM, DE- IVA, waterfall, and all dependencies
